attributes.title: Big Baby Bitch
attributes.caption: The O.G. Chorus Trilogy machinima crew is sending Smash Brothers out with a bang. A bang that consists of some demented game types straight outa Miles' brain.
attributes.description: The O.G. Chorus Trilogy machinima crew is sending Smash Brothers out with a bang. A bang that consists of some demented game types straight outa Miles' brain.

attributes.title: A Robot Penis
attributes.caption: New mics, same BzC crew. Kyle, Maggie and Sam are bringing you an extra long episode today because they are just blazing through chapters.
attributes.description: New mics, same BzC crew. Kyle, Maggie and Sam are bringing you an extra long episode today because they are just blazing through chapters. Well I mean it's only 2 chapters so I don't know if blazing is the right word but like one was really short and the other is really long so there ya go.

attributes.title: Big Chungi
attributes.caption: Little Nightmares keeps pulling our boys back in. They thought all they had to do was deal with the two Flavor Town brothers but they never stopped to ask, who were these chefs making all this food for?
attributes.description: Little Nightmares keeps pulling our boys back in. They thought all they had to do was deal with the two Flavor Town brothers but they never stopped to ask, who were these chefs making all this food for?

attributes.title: Default Names
attributes.caption: Isaac has been through so much up to this point, suffocation, dismemberment, he watched a pterodactyl bring a corpse back to life but finally, FINALLY, he's found Nicole.
attributes.description: Isaac has been through so much up to this point, suffocation, dismemberment, he watched a pterodactyl bring a corpse back to life but finally, FINALLY, he's found Nicole.

attributes.title: Little Nightmares FINALE!
attributes.caption: Our boys have battled many a foe along the way, Dennis the Diddler, Flavor Town, and Big Chungus, a lot of Big Chungus actually. Now there is just one thing standing between them and freedom, a bitch named Karen.
attributes.description: Our boys have battled many a foe along the way, Dennis the Diddler, Flavor Town, and Big Chungus, a lot of Big Chungus actually. Now there is just one thing standing between them and freedom, a bitch named Karen.

attributes.title: Magical Cancer
attributes.caption: Our crew get a emergency message out and it actually gets picked up by another ship! It looks like everything is coming up Isaac. Nothing could go wrong now...
attributes.description: Our crew get a emergency message out and it actually gets picked up by another ship! It looks like everything is coming up Isaac. Nothing could go wrong now...

attributes.title: Mortal Kombat 11
attributes.caption: Our boys have hit the big time! They were flown out to Los Angeles and got some early access game play of Mortal Kombat 11. Special thanks to Warner Bros. Interactive and NetherRealm Studios for letting our boys play their game early. #SponsoredByWB
attributes.description: Our boys have hit the big time! They were flown out to Los Angeles and got some early access game play of Mortal Kombat 11. Special thanks to Warner Bros. Interactive and NetherRealm Studios for letting our boys play their game early. #SponsoredByWB

attributes.title: Swoliosis
attributes.caption: Our crew's on the USM Valor looking for a  *checks notes* singularity core? I'm going to assume that's a fancy way of saying fuel cell. I hope Kyle, Sam, and Maggie have enough ammo.
attributes.description: Our crew's on the USM Valor looking for a  *checks notes* singularity core? I'm going to assume that's a fancy way of saying fuel cell. The problem is that once they find it they stumble upon one very mean necromorph who never skipped leg day... or arm day... you know what? I think every day was gym day for this guy cause he's ripped as shit and he can't wait to show Isaac how tough he is. I hope Kyle, Sam, and Maggie have enough ammo.

attributes.title: Resident Evil 2
attributes.caption: Our boys are walking into the zombie infested streets of Raccoon City as Leon S. Kennedy.
attributes.description: Our boys are walking into the zombie infested streets of Raccoon City as Leon S. Kennedy. Neither of them have played the original which means they have no idea what to expect from this fantastic remake so grab some popcorn, sit back, and enjoy their screams of horror. This is an upload of the livestream Miles and Kyle did on 1/24/2018.

attributes.title: Make Us Whole
attributes.caption: This is it, our crew have made it to the last episode of Dead Space! With only one gun I might add. Now all Kyle, Sam and Maggie have to do is return the Marker to the planet below and end this madness.
attributes.description: This is it, our crew have made it to the last episode of Dead Space! With only one gun I might add. Now all Kyle, Sam and Maggie have to do is return the Marker to the planet below and end this madness.

attributes.title: Eh Yo Marv!
attributes.caption: Our boys are so good at this game, they already have two medallions and only need one more to get out of this god forsaken police station. Then Leon and Marv can be best-est friends forever away from all this zombie nonsense.
attributes.description: Our boys are so good at this game, they already have two medallions and only need one more to get out of this god forsaken police station. Then Leon and Marv can be best-est friends forever away from all this zombie nonsense.

attributes.title: Apex Legends
attributes.caption: Apex Legends is the new battle royale game on the block so Kyle, Sam, and Cole are going to check it out, right after they get a few more warm up rounds in.
attributes.description: Apex Legends is the new battle royale game on the block so Kyle, Sam, and Cole are going to check it out, right after they get a few more warm up rounds in.

attributes.title: Billy!?
attributes.caption: Kyle and Miles need to find a way into the clock tower so they can grab a fuse and hopefully get out of the police station but just as they start to get a handle on things, our boys meet a new friend.
attributes.description: Kyle and Miles need to find a way into the clock tower so they can grab a fuse and hopefully get out of the police station but just as they start to get a handle on things, our boys meet a new friend. A trench coat having, trilby hat wearing, giant, new friend.

attributes.title: Messing with VR
attributes.caption: Would you rather be an Action Hero who can control the flow of time just by standing still or an all powerful Battle Mage with lightning at your fingertips? Thanks to the Oculus Rift, Kyle, Sam, and Chad didn't have to choose.
attributes.description: Would you rather be an Action Hero who can control the flow of time just by standing still or an all powerful Battle Mage with lightning at your fingertips? Thanks to the Oculus Rift, Kyle, Sam, and Chad didn't have to choose. Hopefully they don't accidentally break the camera, or the mics, or the computer, or the lights, or that big TV behind them...I just realized there's a lot of stuff to break in that room.

attributes.title: X Gon' Give It To Ya
attributes.caption: OH LAWD HE COMIN!
attributes.description: OH LAWD HE COMIN!
attributes.display_title: X Gon' Give It To Ya

attributes.title: Blade and Sorcery
attributes.caption: Chad never got his turn at magical, medieval carnage last episode so our crew will once again don their sword, shield, and a lovely new hat to take on hordes of enemies in Blade and Sorcery.
attributes.description: Chad never got his turn at magical, medieval carnage last episode so our crew will once again don their sword, shield, and a lovely new hat to take on hordes of enemies in Blade and Sorcery.

attributes.title: Everything's Wong
attributes.caption: Kyle and Miles don a sexy cocktail dress and put on their favorite pair of pumps to explore the sewers of Raccoon City.
attributes.description: Kyle and Miles don a sexy cocktail dress and put on their favorite pair of pumps to explore the sewers of Raccoon City.

attributes.title: Metro Exodus
attributes.caption: Mutant rats, pterodactyl men and hordes of mutants, just another day in post apocalyptic Russia. Will Kyle, Sam and Cole survive? Not if this games aiming system has anything to say about it.
attributes.description: Mutant rats, pterodactyl men and hordes of mutants, just another day in post apocalyptic Russia. Will Kyle, Sam and Cole survive? Not if this games aiming system has anything to say about it.

attributes.title: I'M FINE!
attributes.caption: This sewer is full of monsters but Kyle and Miles ain't no bitch so they press on in their effort to rescue Ada Wong and hopefully figure out what caused this zombie outbreak.
attributes.description: This sewer is full of monsters but Kyle and Miles ain't no bitch so they press on in their effort to rescue Ada Wong and hopefully figure out what caused this zombie outbreak.

attributes.title: Tender Juicy Butt Meat
attributes.caption: You know things ain't so bad in the hell-scape that is post apocalyptic Russia.
attributes.description: You know things ain't so bad in the hell-scape that is post apocalyptic Russia. Everyone gets to live like a King and eat all the lobster they want. Now the lobsters are 6 foot tall radioactive monsters, that will try to rip your face off annnnnnnnd your kingdom is just a bunch of unusable dirt but still lobster is lobster, even if it gives you cancer.

attributes.title: Dummy Thicc
attributes.caption: Kyle and Miles are in the thicc of it now. They have made their way into the NEST to find a sample of the G-Virus and wouldn't ya know it, the horrible monsters are worse down here.
attributes.description: Kyle and Miles are in the thicc of it now. They have made their way into the NEST to find a sample of the G-Virus and wouldn't ya know it, the horrible monsters are worse down here.

attributes.title: Devil May Cry 5
attributes.caption: Our boys got an early copy of DMC5 and Kyle couldn't be more excited to show Miles the greatness that is Devil May Cry. They're joined by 3D animator Torrian Crawford, of Death Battle and gen:LOCK fame, to help cut through the hordes of demons.
attributes.description: Our boys got an early copy of DMC5 and Kyle couldn't be more excited to show Miles the greatness that is Devil May Cry. They're joined by 3D animator Torrian Crawford, of Death Battle and gen:LOCK fame, to help cut through the hordes of demons. Livestream recorded on 3/7/19.

attributes.title: A Man Named Idiot
attributes.caption: Poor Artyom, he's out here trying to get his people a train car so they can survive the post apocalyptic Russian hellscape and people keep asking him for stuff.
attributes.description: Poor Artyom, he's out here trying to get his people a train car so they can survive the post apocalyptic Russian hellscape and people keep asking him for stuff. Imagine trying to dodge bullets and fend off mutant attacks then someone on the radio is like "Hey I know you're busy not dying and making life better for us but like if you see a guitar that shit would be dope." I'm not trying to sound rude but maybe go get it yourself is all I'm saying.

attributes.title: Am I Dying?
attributes.caption: William Birkin turned himself into a monster and now our boys have to deal with it IN A NO HOLDS BARRED, BATTLE TO THE DEATH IN...the pit? Hey Annette are we calling it the pit? Let's call it the pit.
attributes.description: William Birkin turned himself into a monster and now our boys have to deal with it IN A NO HOLDS BARRED, BATTLE TO THE DEATH IN...the pit? Hey Annette are we calling it the pit? Let's call it the pit.

attributes.title: A Dick So Rugged
attributes.caption: Kyle, Sam, and Cole just want a train car and these mutants ain't having it.
attributes.description: Kyle, Sam, and Cole just want a train car and these mutants ain't having it. The gargoyles keep trying to fly off with Artyom, the giant, Jesus fish is real mad at our boys, and there seems to be a thousand and one human mutants between our crew and the train car they need.

attributes.title: BzC in the Morning
attributes.caption: The boys are back in DMC5 and it feels so good.
attributes.description: The boys are back in DMC5 and it feels so good. When we last left off, Nero and our favorite Edge Lord V were about to split up and scour the city for demonic tree roots to destroy so it looks like Kyle and Miles have a whole heap load of demonic ass to kick. Hopefully with it being the morning and all it won't mess with their ability to play but based on that intro I just watched I have my doubts.

attributes.title: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice
attributes.caption: Sekiro, a game about a stealthy, brutally efficient shinobi on a path to find and rescue his master. Stealthy and efficient is not how I would describe Kyle, Sam, and Cole BUT they are determined soooooooooo there's that.
attributes.description: Sekiro, a game about a stealthy, brutally efficient shinobi on a path to find and rescue his master. Stealthy and efficient is not how I would describe Kyle, Sam, and Cole BUT they are determined soooooooooo there's that.

attributes.title: SNOST or SHOST?
Half-Life Boy
attributes.caption:
Kyle, Cole and Sam get their bearings as shinobi and are making good progress until they come across an enemy they need to use fire on to defeat. So you know what that means right? Time travel.

*Looks at notes*

Wait, what?
attributes.description:
Kyle, Cole and Sam get their bearings as shinobi and are making good progress until they come across an enemy they need to use fire on to defeat. So you know what that means right? Time travel.

*Looks at notes*

Wait, what?

attributes.title: Beth Meth Girl
attributes.caption: Kyle and Miles continue their assault on the Qli...poth...Qli-foth? They continue their assault on the big demonic tree.
attributes.description: Kyle and Miles continue their assault on the Qli...poth...Qli-foth? They continue their assault on the big demonic tree but that's not important right now. What is important is if you could assemble an avengers team of video game characters who would you pick and why?

attributes.title: So Ninja
attributes.caption: Our 3 Ninja have been making great progress so far but soon come across their first real boss. No, I'm not talking about Juzou the Drunkard, I'm talking about Shinobi Hunter Alex.
attributes.description: Our 3 Ninja have been making great progress so far but soon come across their first real boss. No, I'm not talking about Juzou the Drunkard, I'm talking about Shinobi Hunter Alex.

attributes.title: Vitriol and Hate
attributes.caption:
Our boys slay their way through a horde of demons and end up back at Urizen, a giant, all powerful demon with a bunch of tentacles.

Yeah, I know how this hentai ends.
attributes.description:
Our boys slay their way through a horde of demons and end up back at Urizen, a giant, all powerful demon with a bunch of tentacles.

Yeah, I know how this hentai ends.

attributes.title: The Purple Guy
attributes.caption: Three dudes take on a big black cock and drink a pitcher of soju.
attributes.description: Three dudes take on a big black cock and drink a pitcher of soju.

attributes.title: Dante's Back!
attributes.caption: In this episode we got flashbacks in your flashbacks so you can flashback while you're flashbacking.
attributes.description: In this episode we got flashbacks in your flashbacks so you can flashback while you're flashbacking. First our boys enjoy Dante's flashback to real mom and then have a flashback to go save not mom THEN they get to see another flashback to the beginning of the game. After all's said and done I wouldn't be surprised if it turned out this entire game was one giant flashback.

attributes.title: Fairly Lit
attributes.caption: Too bad we can't put fire emojis in our titles because our boys are gettin' lit... or is it the bull that's lit? No nevermind the bull isn't lit, it's just on fire.
attributes.description: Too bad we can't put fire emojis in our titles because our boys are gettin' lit... or is it the bull that's lit? No nevermind the bull isn't lit, it's just on fire.

attributes.title: Twin Scissor Sisters
attributes.caption: Miles discovers his new favorite weapon this episode. Is it a sword? Is it a spear? Nope, it's a demonic motorcycle.
attributes.description: Miles discovers his new favorite weapon this episode. Is it a sword? Is it a spear? Nope, it's a demonic motorcycle. Now I know what you're thinking, can it get any better than a demon motorcycle that Dante wields like a pair of chainsaws? I'm telling you it can. How? It all has to do with the hat Nico is making for Dante.

attributes.title: Way Too Lit
attributes.caption: After getting a couple pitchers in, Kyle, Sam, and Cole murder their way through Ashina Castle so they can rescue best boy Kuro and take revenge on the man that took Sekiro's arm.
attributes.description: After getting a couple pitchers in, Kyle, Sam, and Cole murder their way through Ashina Castle so they can rescue best boy Kuro and take revenge on the man that took Sekiro's arm.

attributes.title: Yugi Boy
attributes.caption: If you have sex with someone who has one body but three heads is it a foursome?
attributes.description: If you have sex with someone who has one body but three heads is it a foursome? V really needs to know because this demon girl is all up on him and while the three heads are a little distracting, it would be cool if he could say he was in a demon girl "four way".

attributes.title: Get Shreked
attributes.caption: Kyle, Cole and Sam are back with a thirst for vengeance.... and more alcohol.
attributes.description: Kyle, Cole and Sam are back with a thirst for vengeance.... and more alcohol.

attributes.title: The Cow Store
attributes.caption: Our boys continue their decent in the Qliphoth and take on not one but two bosses and they both have three heads! So when you think about it they're really taking on six bosses this episode.
attributes.description: Our boys continue their decent in the Qliphoth and take on not one but two bosses and they both have three heads! So when you think about it they're really taking on six bosses this episode. Oh! I forgot the giant chicken so do I hear seven? Seven bosses this episode!

attributes.title: Monkey Booze
attributes.caption: Kyle, Sam, and Cole reach the top of the mountain and find not the mortal blade but a bell. What do you think will happen if they ring this bell?
attributes.description: Kyle, Sam, and Cole reach the top of the mountain and find not the mortal blade but a bell. What do you think will happen if they ring this bell? If you guessed they'd get transported to a plain between life and death where they would have to kill a whole bunch of monkeys then you cheated and looked ahead because there is no way you would have guessed that.

attributes.title: A Post GoT World
attributes.caption: Miles and Kyle are talking about Game of Thrones and kicking Urizen's ass this episode so get your popcorn ready.
attributes.description: Miles and Kyle are talking about Game of Thrones and kicking Urizen's ass this episode so get your popcorn ready. But hold on, I just had a thought. If they are on mission 17 and DMC games usually have 20 missions then what twists await our boys after this boss fight?

attributes.title: Spider Juice
attributes.caption: Kyle, Sam, and Cole are starting it off right today by paying off the debts; their drink debts that is.
attributes.description: Kyle, Sam, and Cole are starting it off right today by paying off the debts; their drink debts that is. Once they pay down their libations from last episode they head off in search of some "fresh fruit" that an old lady told them about and give a couple of gourd seeds to best girl Emma.

attributes.title: Fuck You Dad!
attributes.caption: It's all been leading to this, Dante vs. Vergil: The Rematch! Can our boys beat Vergil and put this sibling rivalry to rest?
attributes.description: It's all been leading to this, Dante vs. Vergil: The Rematch! Can our boys beat Vergil and put this sibling rivalry to rest? Will Nero get to confront his father before Dante kills him? Why are these stick figures killing each other? All of these questions and more will be answered in the DMC5 finale!

attributes.title: Probiotics
attributes.caption: Drinking with Isshin, taking out a whole fort filled with guns, and fighting a giant monkey. Kyle, Sam and Cole are super busy this episode.
attributes.description: Drinking with Isshin, taking out a whole fort filled with guns, and fighting a giant monkey. Kyle, Sam and Cole are super busy this episode.

attributes.title: Claire (2nd Run)
attributes.caption: The boys are back in Resident Evil 2 going through Claire's story to get the true ending. Problem is that it's been a few months since Kyle and Miles have touched RE2 but the game doesn't know that and it's throwing every Zombie it can at them.
attributes.description: The boys are back in Resident Evil 2 going through Claire's story to get the true ending. Problem is that it's been a few months since Kyle and Miles have touched RE2 but the game doesn't know that and it's throwing every Zombie it can at them.

attributes.title: I Can Bleed, I Can FIGHT!
attributes.caption: How many tries do you think it will take for Kyle, Sam, and Cole to kill that damned dirty ape? Four tries? Ten tries? Cole thinks it's going to take seven tries.
attributes.description: How many tries do you think it will take for Kyle, Sam, and Cole to kill that damned dirty ape? Four tries? Ten tries? Cole thinks it's going to take seven tries. Better question, how man tries do you think it will take for them to sneak past the giant reptile guarding the dried viscera? If you answered 'More tries than it should." CONGRATS! Your cookie is in the mail.
attributes.display_title: I Can Bleed, I Can FIGHT!

attributes.title: Dennis
attributes.caption: Kyle and Miles are in a pickle, they have too many things and Claire's outfit, while cute, does not have enough pockets to hold it all.
attributes.description: Kyle and Miles are in a pickle, they have too many things and Claire's outfit, while cute, does not have enough pockets to hold it all. Oh and there's a dick ton of zombies in this police station. Like for real, there were not this many zombies here when they boys played through as Leon.

attributes.title: Ashina Depths
attributes.caption: Remember, you miss 100% of the ledges you don't land on.
attributes.description: Remember, you miss 100% of the ledges you don't land on.

attributes.title: 54 Minutes
attributes.caption: Hey member that part in Leon's story when the boys were in the kennel downstairs with all the zombie dogs? You know what would be awful? If they were all replaced by Lickers.
attributes.description: Hey member that part in Leon's story when the boys were in the kennel downstairs with all the zombie dogs? You know what would be awful? If they were all replaced by Lickers.

attributes.title: Peanut Butter Chungus
attributes.caption: Kyle, Cole, and Sam, have not one but two damned dirty apes to fight this episode. They should be fine because Kyle and Sam both just got back from vacation so they are rested and ready to fight!
attributes.description: Kyle, Cole, and Sam, have not one but two damned dirty apes to fight this episode. They should be fine because Kyle and Sam both just got back from vacation so they are rested and ready to fight! I mean they would be but they're too busy talking about the Final Fantasy 7 remake news so they make Cole fight the monkeys instead.

attributes.title: Home Base
attributes.caption: Remember when you were a kid playing tag? If someone got to home base they were safe and you couldn't tag them but there was always that one kid who wouldn't follow the rules.
attributes.description:
Remember when you were a kid playing tag? If someone got to home base they were safe and you couldn't tag them but there was always that one kid who wouldn't follow the rules.
That is NOT Mr.X.
Mr.X knows that if you don't follow the rules there can't be a game, society will break down, chaos will rule. He will not break the sanctity of home base for anything. Kyle and Miles know this, they respect this, and in this episode they are going to exploit the shit out of it.

attributes.title: O'Rin of the Water
attributes.caption: Kyle, Sam and Cole find themselves in the village of the undead, well maybe undead is not the right word.
attributes.description: Kyle, Sam and Cole find themselves in the village of the undead, well maybe undead is not the right word. These people did not come back from the dead they are undying, but village of the undying does not feel as dreadful, neither does village of the resilient or village of the really, really, hard to kill so we are going to stick with village of the undead.

attributes.title: It's RTX! (Almost)
attributes.caption: Our boys are in the shit again, literally again. After an exciting romp to the Orphanage and a confrontation with the chief they end up in the sewers with everyone's favorite, chess themed, fuse box puzzle.
attributes.description: Our boys are in the shit again, literally again. After an exciting romp to the Orphanage and a confrontation with the chief they end up in the sewers with everyone's favorite, chess themed, fuse box puzzle.

attributes.title: Did We Survive RTX?
attributes.caption: So they asked me to write this before RTX so I don't know if Kyle, Sam, and Cole survived but I CAN tell you in this episode they face off with a ghostly Monk and learn how to swim. So you know, there's that.
attributes.description: So they asked me to write this before RTX so I don't know if Kyle, Sam, and Cole survived but I CAN tell you in this episode they face off with a ghostly Monk and learn how to swim. So you know, there's that.

attributes.title: Grocery Shopping
attributes.caption: The boys are back in their old neighborhood, a.k.a the police station, looking for gubbins so they can fight some mutant rats in the sewers. I wonder if any of those rats are named Splinter? Oh I hope one of them is named Splinter. ^_^
attributes.description: The boys are back in their old neighborhood, a.k.a the police station, looking for gubbins so they can fight some mutant rats in the sewers. I wonder if any of those rats are named Splinter? Oh I hope one of them is named Splinter. ^_^

attributes.title: Silent But Deadly
attributes.caption: The boys have been out doing a little swim around Ashina but now it's time to go back and check in on best boy Kuro.
attributes.description: The boys have been out doing a little swim around Ashina but now it's time to go back and check in on best boy Kuro. Unfortunately while they were away someone tuned off all of their waypoints to the castle so you know that means something nefarious is going down.

attributes.title: Gamer Girl Bathwater
attributes.caption: Kyle and Miles face off with Mr. Birkin once again but this time they're ready, is what I would like to say, but you know our boys.
attributes.description: Kyle and Miles face off with Mr. Birkin once again but this time they're ready, is what I would like to say, but you know our boys. Somehow they have to survive this boss, rescue Sherry from her garbage prison and hopefully find a cure for her somewhere in the bowels of Umbrella's secret facility all while keeping The Gram up to date.

attributes.title: Daddy Bathwater
attributes.caption: The castle has been invaded so it's time for Sekiro to do a whole lotta murder. What awaits him at the top?
attributes.description: The castle has been invaded so it's time for Sekiro to do a whole lotta murder. What awaits him at the top? You probably guessed a boss fight but who the boss is will leave you with some trust issues and it will leave Kyle, Sam, and Cole with a very important choice to make.

attributes.title: Birkin vs. Claire: The Rematch
attributes.caption: Kyle and Miles have made their way deep into the nest and after what some would call an embarrassing amount of time spent on one particular puzzle, they are ready to face off with the monster formerly known as William Birkin once again.
attributes.description: Kyle and Miles have made their way deep into the nest and after what some would call an embarrassing amount of time spent on one particular puzzle, they are ready to face off with the monster formerly known as William Birkin once again.

attributes.title: Mario Maker 2
attributes.caption: Miles has made a series of levels to "entertain" Kyle, Sam and Cole with.
attributes.description: Miles has made a series of levels to "entertain" Kyle, Sam and Cole with.

attributes.title: Resident Evil 2 Finale!
attributes.caption: Today is the day, the day our boys beat Resident Evil 2 again for the last time and finally get the true ending.
attributes.description: Today is the day, the day our boys beat Resident Evil 2 again for the last time and finally get the true ending.

attributes.title: Sadism or Masochism?
attributes.caption: Is this level sadistic or masochistic? Miles made it and we know he is deriving some twisted pleasure from the pain of Kyle, Sam, and Cole but then again our boys could just stop playing it.
attributes.description: Is this level sadistic or masochistic? Miles made it and we know he is deriving some twisted pleasure from the pain of Kyle, Sam, and Cole but then again our boys could just stop playing it. So are they masochists because they choose to continue to play this same level over and over? You know what I think? Why not both?

attributes.title: Halo 3
attributes.caption: After what seemed like an eternity, the boys are back in Halo to finish the fight! I'm not crying, you're crying.
attributes.description: After what seemed like an eternity, the boys are back in Halo to finish the fight! I'm not crying, you're crying.

attributes.title: Staring at Butts
attributes.caption: After a two week "vacation" into Mario Maker 2, our favorite Monday threesome is back in Sekiro to explore the memories held in the Owl's bell charm.
attributes.description: After a two week "vacation" into Mario Maker 2, our favorite Monday threesome is back in Sekiro to explore the memories held in the Owl's bell charm.

attributes.title: Lifeguard Sternt
attributes.caption: You asked and they delivered, the boys are playing more Halo 3 now with 100% more facecam!
attributes.description: You asked and they delivered, the boys are playing more Halo 3 now with 100% more facecam! Wait it's cut into two boxes for each of their Halo feeds, so is it 200% more facecam? Then again it's being filmed with one camera so it should just be 100% more facecam right? Whatever, my brain hurts. What was I writing about?

attributes.title: Bad Dad Fight Redux
attributes.caption: Our boys have got a doozy of a fight on their hands. Turns out this version of Dad fucks...and by that I mean he is way harder than the old and feeble version that they fought before.
attributes.description: Our boys have got a doozy of a fight on their hands. Turns out this version of Dad fucks...and by that I mean he is way harder than the old and feeble version that they fought before. Now I don't know bout you guys but I think by the end of this fight our boys will owe us so many drinks that they won't be able to sit in their chairs next episode.

attributes.title: It Followed Me Home
attributes.caption: Our boys are asking the BIG questions this episode; the mysteries of the universe kind of questions like, why was Halo 3 game fuel orange colored instead of green like the Master Chief? You know, the questions that keep you up at night.
attributes.description: Our boys are asking the BIG questions this episode; the mysteries of the universe kind of questions like, why was Halo 3 game fuel orange colored instead of green like the Master Chief? You know, the questions that keep you up at night.

attributes.title: Paying Off Debt
attributes.caption: Never go into debt if you can help it kids, whether it's money or alcohol it hurts to pay it back and our boys are feeling it. Hopefully they can hold it together long enough for Sekiro to get through the Divine Realm.
attributes.description: Never go into debt if you can help it kids, whether it's money or alcohol it hurts to pay it back and our boys are feeling it. Hopefully they can hold it together long enough for Sekiro to get through the Divine Realm.

attributes.title: Shadow People
attributes.caption: Our boys are tearing up this campaign and get to the level with, quite possibly, the greatest weapon in Halo 3, The Spartan Laser. Unfortunately Miles doesn't get one but what he does get is a new "feature" for the textures in his game.
attributes.description: Our boys are tearing up this campaign and get to the level with, quite possibly, the greatest weapon in Halo 3, The Spartan Laser. Unfortunately Miles doesn't get one but what he does get is a new "feature" for the textures in his game.

attributes.title: ROAR Sabimaru!
attributes.caption: The boys keep dying so the boys keep drinking but despite their best efforts, Kyle, Sam, and Cole make some decent progress this episode.
attributes.description: The boys keep dying so the boys keep drinking but despite their best efforts, Kyle, Sam, and Cole make some decent progress this episode.

attributes.title: Send Me Out, With A Bang
attributes.caption: It has been YEARS since our boys first started the fight in Halo 1 and now finally, in this episode, they finish the fight.
attributes.description: It has been YEARS since our boys first started the fight in Halo 1 and now finally, in this episode, they finish the fight.
attributes.display_title: Send Me Out, With A Bang

attributes.title: Sober Sekiro
attributes.caption: Our boys are here to do one thing and that is beat Sekiro so to avoid taking another twenty something parts to finish this game they will be (mostly) sober for the rest of the series.
attributes.description: Our boys are here to do one thing and that is beat Sekiro so to avoid taking another twenty something parts to finish this game they will be (mostly) sober for the rest of the series.

attributes.title: Dishonored
attributes.caption: Victorian setting? Sweet satanic powers? A preteen girl pining after the WAY too old for her protagonist? Is this Interview with a Vampire? NO! It's Dishonored.
attributes.description: Victorian setting? Sweet satanic powers? A preteen girl pining after the WAY too old for her protagonist? Is this Interview with a Vampire? NO! It's Dishonored.

attributes.title: The Divine Dragon
attributes.caption: How do you make a Dragon cry? Do you remind it of an embarrassing moment from middle school? Do you show it that moment from Field of Dreams where Kevin Costner asks his dad to play catch?
attributes.description: How do you make a Dragon cry? Do you remind it of an embarrassing moment from middle school? Do you show it that moment from Field of Dreams where Kevin Costner asks his dad to play catch? I think that would work but unfortunately none of the boys brought that movie with them to the battle so they're going to have to go with plan B, physical abuse in the form of sword stabs until that sucker squeezes out a couple tears.

attributes.title: SEGA Genesis Mini
attributes.caption:
Thank you to SEGA of America for providing our boys with the Genesis Mini!

Kyle and Miles tackle the SEGA games of yore and remember how much fun those games were and also how bad they were at playing them.
attributes.description:
Thank you to SEGA of America for providing our boys with the Genesis Mini!

Kyle and Miles tackle the SEGA games of yore and remember how much fun those games were and also how bad they were at playing them.

attributes.title: Ashina is on Fire!
attributes.caption: Ashina is being invaded, there is a head banging ghost in a lake, the boys can't sneak past anything to save their life, and everything is on fire. Who knew that killing a deity would have such an effect on the world?
attributes.description: Ashina is being invaded, there is a head banging ghost in a lake, the boys can't sneak past anything to save their life, and everything is on fire. Who knew that killing a deity would have such an effect on the world?

attributes.title: The Millennial Nursing Home
attributes.caption: Kyle and Miles set out on their first assassination mission and it goes about how you would expect.     Poorly, it goes poorly.
attributes.description:
Kyle and Miles set out on their first assassination mission and it goes about how you would expect.




Poorly, it goes poorly.

attributes.title: Sekiro FINALE!
attributes.caption: Kyle, Sam, and Cole started this playthrough way, way back in March, and finally, today, they will finish it. The only things standing in their way are the two hardest bosses in the game. NBD right?
attributes.description: Kyle, Sam, and Cole started this playthrough way, way back in March, and finally, today, they will finish it. The only things standing in their way are the two hardest bosses in the game. NBD right?

attributes.title: Visage - 2nd Attempt
attributes.caption: Now with 100% more progress.
attributes.description: After last year Miles swore he would never play Visage again so Kyle put the PC in a box, filled that box with concrete, and buried it in the back yard. However, like any super natural source of pure evil, Visage can not be contained and with the power of 2Spooky October it has found our boys.

attributes.title: F.E.A.R.
attributes.description:
Int. Board Room - High Rise Military Office Building

A group of soldiers and a Commander sit around a conference table.

Commander: Our unit will be called, First Encounter Assault Recon aka the F.E.A.R. unit.

Soldier 1: Sounds intimidating

Soldier 2: It sounds awesome!

Soldier 3: So engage and shoot first then you recon the place? It sounds like our priorities are out of order. Shouldn't it be First you Recon then you Encounter and Assault?

The Commander slowly walks over and throws Soldier 3 out the window.

attributes.title: Layers of Fear 2
attributes.caption: Any great actor will always need a G.O.T.E. sheet for their character. Goals, Obstacles, Tactics and Expectations. Let's fill one out for Kyle and Miles during this 2Spooky Let's Play.
attributes.description:
Any great actor will always need a G.O.T.E. sheet for their character. Goals, Obstacles, Tactics and Expectations. Let's fill one out for Kyle and Miles during this 2Spooky Let's Play:

Goal? - Get off the ship
Obstacles in the way of that goal? - The Ship
Tactics to achieve that goal? - Run and Scream
Expectations for Kyle and Miles? - Lots of screaming followed by death.

attributes.title: In Lucy's Eyes
attributes.caption: The boys are playing Amnesia...well not really, it's a mod for Amnesia but a very good mod. Kyle, Sam, and Cole search for their wife and child in the depths of a haunted castle while a forlorn ghost with glowing eyes stalks their every move.
attributes.description: The boys are playing Amnesia...well not really, it's a mod for Amnesia but a very good mod. Kyle, Sam, and Cole search for their wife and child in the depths of a haunted castle while a forlorn ghost with glowing eyes stalks their every move.

attributes.title: Doom 3
attributes.caption: Our boys are here to shoot things and chew bubble gum in what was, at one time, one of the scariest things on Xbox.
attributes.description: Our boys are here to shoot things and chew bubble gum in what was, at one time, one of the scariest things on Xbox.

attributes.title: Five Nights at Freddy's VR
attributes.caption: Kyle, Cole, and Unscareable Sam take on the family friendly animatronics from Five Night's at Freddy's.
attributes.description: Kyle, Cole, and Unscareable Sam take on the family friendly animatronics from Five Night's at Freddy's.

attributes.title: Visage - Pt.3, Dolores
attributes.caption: *Slow clapping* Well you did it, all of lovely FIRST members did it. Since so many of you watched the last episode of Visage and asked for more, Kyle and Miles can't say no.
attributes.description: *Slow clapping* Well you did it, all of lovely FIRST members did it. Since so many of you watched the last episode of Visage and asked for more, Kyle and Miles can't say no. Now our boys have to strap themselves in for another round with one of the scariest games they have ever played.

attributes.title: Visage - Pt.4, Never Again
attributes.caption: It's Halloween! That means it's the last day of 2Spooky October and our boys have a super sized episode for us. So strap in, turn off the lights, and get your popcorn ready because this is the last, THE LAST, episode of Visage.
attributes.description: It's Halloween! That means it's the last day of 2Spooky October and our boys have a super sized episode for us. So strap in, turn off the lights, and get your popcorn ready because this is the last, THE LAST, episode of Visage.

attributes.title: Mario Maker 2 - We WILL Beat This Level
attributes.caption: A sense of unfinished business has been burning in the hearts of our boys since they last played Super Mario Maker 2 and so they take up the challenge once again to see if they can beat Miles' level.
attributes.description: Kyle, Sam, and Cole have beaten Sekiro, finished 2Spooky October, and Death Stranding is on the horizon but something's not right. A sense of unfinished business has been burning in the hearts of our boys since they last played Super Mario Maker 2 and so they take up the challenge once again to see if they can beat Miles' level.
attributes.display_title: Mario Maker 2 - We WILL Beat This Level

attributes.title: Back to Dishonored
attributes.caption: Our boys survived 2Spooky October and are back playing Dishonored and I bet they totally remember how to play and everything will be fine, Lol.
attributes.description: Our boys survived 2Spooky October and are back playing Dishonored and I bet they totally remember how to play and everything will be fine, Lol.

attributes.title: Death Stranding
attributes.caption: Put on your backpack and grab a pair of your best package delivering shoes because today Kyle, Sam, and Cole are "playing" Death Stranding.
attributes.description: Put on your backpack and grab a pair of your best package delivering shoes because today Kyle, Sam, and Cole are "playing" Death Stranding.

attributes.title: Post Extra Life
attributes.caption: Somehow our boys survived Extra Life 2019 after consuming, what some would say is a stupid amount of Whiter Claw. Now they return to Dishonored to continue their totally flawless, very honorable playthrough.
attributes.description: Somehow our boys survived Extra Life 2019 after consuming, what some would say is a stupid amount of Whiter Claw. Now they return to Dishonored to continue their totally flawless, very honorable playthrough.

attributes.title: Corpse Disposal Team
attributes.caption: In this episode Reedus and the fetus finally team up again for the first time since P.T. aka Silent Hills.
attributes.description: In this episode Reedus and the fetus finally team up again for the first time since P.T. aka Silent Hills.

attributes.title: The Golden Cat
attributes.caption: Our boys are balls deep in this whore...house looking for information about where to find Emily. They know there is a man here who has the information they want and he just happens to be all tied up at the moment, eh heh heh heh.
attributes.description: Our boys are balls deep in this whore...house looking for information about where to find Emily. They know there is a man here who has the information they want and he just happens to be all tied up at the moment, eh heh heh heh.

attributes.title: Jedi: Fallen Order
attributes.caption: Kyle, Sam, and Cole are playing Jedi: Fallen Order aka Dark Souls with a lightsaber and a nice sprinkling of Uncharted on top.
attributes.description: Kyle, Sam, and Cole are playing Jedi: Fallen Order aka Dark Souls with a lightsaber and a nice sprinkling of Uncharted on top.

attributes.title: Admiral Havelock Has Some Issues
attributes.caption: It's Thanksgiving! You know what that means? Kyle and Miles have brought out the traditional Backwardz Compatible turkey TV because you're totally, absolutely, not tired of seeing turkey at this point right?
attributes.description: It's Thanksgiving! You know what that means? Kyle and Miles have brought out the traditional Backwardz Compatible turkey TV because you're totally, absolutely, not tired of seeing turkey at this point right?

attributes.title: Beep Trill
attributes.caption: Kyle, Sam, and Cole have been approaching this fight with Oggdo Bogdo all wrong.
attributes.description: Kyle, Sam, and Cole have been approaching this fight with Oggdo Bogdo all wrong. Instead of a Death Battle they should be spittin out some mad rhymes in a rap battle. I mean what's Oggdo Bogdo gonna do? Flick his tongue around? Croak or something? He's a big, alien frog dog, he can't rhyme. Our boys have this in the bag.

attributes.title: Lady Boyle's Party
attributes.caption: Sometimes in life it's all about seizing the moment; when opportunity knocks you answer the door.
attributes.description: Sometimes in life it's all about seizing the moment; when opportunity knocks you answer the door. You don't leave opportunity, all alone over by the secluded window where it asked you to meet it because then opportunity is going to feel jilted and not talk to you again for the rest of the night.

attributes.title: Something's Different
attributes.caption: Something is different about BzC this week. I mean the boys are there, they're playing Jedi: Fallen Order but I can't quite figure out what's off about this episode. Ah ha! I know what it is, it's the elephant.
attributes.description: Something is different about BzC this week. I mean the boys are there, they're playing Jedi: Fallen Order but I can't quite figure out what's off about this episode. Ah ha! I know what it is, it's the elephant.

attributes.title: Flawless Assassin
attributes.caption: Our boys are so good that they are already at the end of the game. All they have to do is kill the Lord Regent and it's over and we all know our boys are flawless when it comes to planning and execution right?
attributes.description: Our boys are so good that they are already at the end of the game. All they have to do is kill the Lord Regent and it's over and we all know our boys are flawless when it comes to planning and execution right? No comedy of errors on this run, nu uh, no sir. Total flawless assassins right here.

attributes.title: The Wind Temple
attributes.caption: Trill Beep is going deep into the planet Zeffo to learn some new force powers.
attributes.description: Trill Beep is going deep into the planet Zeffo to learn some new force powers.

attributes.title: Biskers
attributes.caption: Our top notch, flawless assassins, aka Kyle and Miles, have this one last target to kill and then the game is over: totally, 100%, over. Well, unless someone betrays them of course.
attributes.description: Our top notch, flawless assassins, aka Kyle and Miles, have this one last target to kill and then the game is over: totally, 100%, over. Well, unless someone betrays them of course.

attributes.title: Early Mornin' Recordin'
attributes.caption: Remember Shadows of the Empire? You know how it had that awesome boss fight against that AT-ST? Man that was cool. Why did I bring that up? No reason.
attributes.description: Remember Shadows of the Empire? You know how it had that awesome boss fight against that AT-ST? Man that was cool. Why did I bring that up? No reason.

attributes.title: Side Cam
attributes.caption: You know when an NPC mentions something like I don't know, five or six times, you and I would take that as a hint to do something right? Not our boys.
attributes.description: You know when an NPC mentions something like I don't know, five or six times, you and I would take that as a hint to do something right? Not our boys.

attributes.title: Crack Open A Tall Boy
attributes.caption: It's the last BzC of 2019! To celebrate, Kyle, Sam, and Cole are on a mission to find a double bladed lightsaber on Dathomir.
attributes.description: It's the last BzC of 2019! To celebrate, Kyle, Sam, and Cole are on a mission to find a double bladed lightsaber on Dathomir.
